mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE target_id = #{articleId} AND type = 'article' and is_like = 1) AS likeCount, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM user_favorites WHERE target_id = #{articleId}) AS collectCount, IFNULL((SELECT is_like FROM likes WHERE target_id = #{articleId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND type = 'article'), 0) AS isLiked, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM user_favorites WHERE target_id = #{articleId} AND user_id = #{userId}) > 0 AS isCollected
